attributes.title: i was bonked on the head
attributes.review: when i first downloaded and opened this app, a group of people began to amass at my front door. turns out, this app tracked my location and shared it with a group of white, middle aged conservatives. this group found my home address and camped out to give me a welcoming party for downloading the app. when they found out i was an asian american woman they tried to accuse me of witchcraft and dunk me in a pool of water. after that, i was soaking wet and they threw sand on me! they then kicked me in the groin and honked me on the head. not a very good app :(
